5080.verse: لَّهُۥ|For Him|69|85|977$مُلْكُ|(is the) dominion|131|162|1005$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|163|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۚ|and the earth,|116|147|352$وَإِلَى|and to|67|98|1836$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|69|606$تُرْجَعُ|will be returned|122|352|1837$ٱلْأُمُورُ|the matters.|103|333|1838$

5081.verse: يُولِجُ|He merges|89|97|12164$ٱلَّيْلَ|the night|80|95|2742$فِى|into|48|63|89$ٱلنَّهَارِ|the day|75|90|2743$وَيُولِجُ|and He merges|118|133|12165$ٱلنَّهَارَ|the day|75|90|2745$فِى|into|48|63|89$ٱلَّيْلِ‌ۚ|the night,|85|93|1418$وَهُوَ|and He|66|144|305$عَلِيمُۢ|(is) All-Knower|117|274|307$بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ|of what is in the breasts.|188|266|3417$

5083.verse: وَمَا|And what|83|97|46$لَكُمْ|(is) for you|94|123|207$لَا|(that) not|87|116|30$تُؤْمِنُونَ|you believe|95|124|4108$بِٱللَّهِ‌ۙ|in Allah|67|96|79$وَٱلرَّسُولُ|while the Messenger|155|169|3387$يَدْعُوكُمْ|calls you|94|102|3388$لِتُؤْمِنُواْ|that you believe|128|144|15865$بِرَبِّكُمْ|in your Lord,|103|119|3615$وَقَدْ|and indeed,|97|113|2117$أَخَذَ|He has taken|107|123|6882$مِيثَـٰقَكُمْ|your covenant|116|124|626$إِن|if|44|164|225$كُنتُم|you are|70|309|214$مُّؤْمِنِينَ|believers.|93|212|879$

5079.verse: It is He who created the heavens and earth in six days and then established Himself above the Throne. He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein; and He is with you wherever you are. And Allah, of what you do, is Seeing.

5080.verse: His is the dominion of the heavens and earth. And to Allah are returned [all] matters.

5081.verse: He causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night, and he is Knowing of that within the breasts.

5082.verse: Believe in Allah and His Messenger and spend out of that in which He has made you successors. For those who have believed among you and spent, there will be a great reward.

5083.verse: And why do you not believe in Allah while the Messenger invites you to believe in your Lord and He has taken your covenant, if you should [truly] be believers?

5084.verse: It is He who sends down upon His Servant [Muhammad] verses of clear evidence that He may bring you out from darknesses into the light. And indeed, Allah is to you Kind and Merciful.

5085.verse: And why do you not spend in the cause of Allah while to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth? Not equal among you are those who spent before the conquest [of Makkah] and fought [and those who did so after it]. Those are greater in degree than they who spent afterwards and fought. But to all Allah has promised the best [reward]. And Allah, with what you do, is Acquainted.

5086.verse: Who is it that would loan Allah a goodly loan so He will multiply it for him and he will have a noble reward?
